r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.4M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Pageau Morel Associes. The average
  contract duration was 1.2 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $168.4K. The longest
  contract was 8.1 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.0M.
lookup_name: 'PAGEAU MOREL ASSOCIES'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.4M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '45'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '10'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '22%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '84%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2.3'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '2.0M'
s424_mean_duration: '1.2'
s421_mean_contract_value: '168.4K'
s425_max_duration: '8.1'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.0M'
